title: CRAZY DOODLING with REPRAP + PENHOLDER DRAWING A "B"
content:
Thats an exercise man versus machine. We change a part of a plotter 3D to develop this experiment.  
This is only the first prove with a pen but in a future.. lets see. Normally this machine is used to do parts of solid plastic in 3D,  
 If someone wants to try our new machine.

hope u like it! : )
